text:
Ro: Hey guys, it’s Ro, welcome to another
Nerdy Nummies!
Ro: Today I have special guest, I have Muzzafuzza!

Ro: He’s really tall! So we’re gonna pry
have to get you a chair.

Ro: I’m gonna pull you down right here,
do some squats.

Muzzafuzza: Oh no, that’s not gonna
work.

Ro: Yeah, let’s go get you a chair! We’ll
be back!

Ro: I got a lot of requests in the comments
for a Gears of War Nerdy Nummies!

Ro: We’re gonna make cupcakes today! Muzzafuzza:
I’m pretty excited to make some

Muzzafuzza: Nerdy Nummies. Ro: Yeah! Muzzafuzza:
This is my first time baking, so…
Ro: Oh… Muzzafuzza: I’m gonna suck, but…
Ro: That’s OK! You’re in good hands!

Ro: Ingredients you will need: You’ll need
a box cake, yeah, that’s right,
Ro: yellow box cake mix, and water!

Muzzafuzza: You’re gonna need some chicken
eggs. Ro: Yeah from chickens!

Muzzafuzza: Yeah! Ro: Yeah! Muzzafuzza: And
some vegetable oil.

Ro: Yeah from veg… Muzzafuzza: Tables….
Ro: Tables…

Ro: The tools that we’re gonna use today
are gonna be…

Muzzafuzza: First things first, rolling pin,
for flattening everything!

Ro: Everything! Muzzafuzza: All the things.
Ro: Yeah.

Muzzafuzza: Second, we got a whisk, because
we’re gonna be beating some eggs.

Muzzafuzza: Lastbut not least for me, you guys gave
her some shit in the last episode,

Muzzafuzza: this is not a little, what did
you call it? A little spatula-thingy?

Ro: A, a frosting spreader! Muzzafuzza: It’s
now the Mustache-ula!
Ro: Mustache-ula. Muzzafuzza: Yeah!

Ro: And then we’re gonna have a regular
spatula, and all these fancy cake tools

Ro: that I got at Michaels, I don’t know
what they do, but I’m gonna use them!

Ro: They look pretty good! And, cupcake tray,
lined with these, paper, cupcake…

Muzzafuzza: Thing-ys! Ro: Thing-ys! And a
bowl and a measuring cup.
Muzzafuzza: Yeah!

Ro: Time to start baking! Muzzafuzza: Hell
yeah! Ro: Yeah!

Muzzafuzza: Oh man, this isn’t coming out
very well.

Muzzafuzza: Get in there! Oh no the bag! Ro:
Perfect!

Ro: Now vegetable oil. Muzzafuzza: Alright.
Ro: Need 1/3.

Muzzafuzza: Oooh-hoo-hoo-hoo! Ro: These are
organic free range eggs.

Muzzafuzza: Magical chicken eggs. Ro: Cage
free!

Muzzafuzza: Wait, they’re not… Ro: Alright
are you ready? I’m gonna teach you
Ro: how to crack an egg with 1 hand.

Muzzafuzza: These aren’t like unicorn eggs?
Ro: Nope.
Ro: Crack… Muzzafuzza: That is not happening.

Muzzafuzza: Crack! Oho! Ro: Yeah, you got
it! You got it!

Muzzafuzza: Squeeze, come on! Ro: No fear,
egg cracking!

Muzzafuzza: Definitely not getting any yolk
though, where’s the yolk at?

Ro: Oh it’s hiding, oh! Muzzafuzza: There
it is! Ro: Oh we got it!
Muzzafuzza: And now we mix!

Muzzafuzza: Oh I’m a power whisker. How
long do we do this?

Ro: For like a couple minutes. Muzzafuzza:
A couple? OK…
Ro: Ding! Done! Muzzafuzza: Whew! Are we good?
Ro: Yup. Muzzafuzza: Alright. Ro: Ready to put the batter into the cupcake trays.

Ro: And when you’re filling these, you only
want to fill them about 1/2 way

Ro: to 75% full, because they like to rise,
and otherwise, if you fill them
Ro: more than that, then it will.

Muzzafuzza: Then you're gonna have some big-ass
cupcakes!

Ro: You’ll have some really big-ass
cupcakes!
Ro: They’re gonna be like monster cupcakes!
Ro: OK, next 1!
Ro: Boom!

Ro: These fancy cupcakes are ready for baking,
you’re gonna preheat your oven to

Ro: 350, and throw these suckers in for about
20 minutes.

Ro: While these things are baking, I was thinking
about playing a video game?

Muzzafuzza: I’m down, do you have gears
of war 3?

Ro: No…. Um… Muzzafuzza: Do you have anything
that we can kill something?

Muzzafuzza: Yeah? Ro: Yeah, yeah… Muzzafuzza:
Alright let’s do it!
Ro: I got something! It’s classic!
Ro: Cake’s Ready-s!

Ro: Once your cupcakes are done baking, make
sure they’ve had plenty of time

Ro: to cool, and then, it’s time to frost
with your mustache-ula!
Muzzafuzza: Yeah!

Ro: We’re using chocolate creamy frosting,
I wouldn’t use anything whipped because

Ro: again, we’re gonna put a bunch of things
on top, so, the creamy frosting…

Muzzafuzza: Get in there. Ro: Is what makes
everything stick!

Muzzafuzza: Alright. Ro: Then you go like
this… Muzzafuzza: How much should I grab?

Ro: That looks good. Muzzafuzza: This? Ro:
Yeah. Muzzafuzza: OK.

Ro: And then put it on there, and just kind
of spin the cupcake.
Ro: Yeah, there you go.
Ro: Perfect! Muzzafuzza: Ugly!

Ro: No it looks really good! Muzzafuzza: But
they're so messy, look how

Muzzafuzza: clean yours looks, yours looks
like a… Ro: No one’s gonna, you’re

Ro: not gonna see it because we’re gonna
have sparkles on the top of it!

Ro: We just finished frosting, now it’s
time to decorate!
Ro: Now we’re gonna need black sprinkles.

Muzzafuzza: That’s a lot of sprinkles! Ro:
Yeah!

Ro: Now it’s time to decorate, we’re gonna
do the red decoration, we’re gonna

Ro: be making Gears of War 3, uh, logos. Muzzafuzza:
Mmmhmmm.

Ro: This is a candy mold. Muzzafuzza: Cool
skulls!

Ro: Yeah, skull candy mold. So the first thing
we’re gonna do is take these,

Ro: It’s red chocolate, and you can melt
them either on the stove or

Ro: in the microwave. we’re just gonna put
these in the microwave
Ro: for about 20 seconds.

Ro: Chocolate’s all melted, and now we’re
going to scoop it into the bag and

Ro: watch out, because it’s really, really
hot when it comes out of the

Ro: microwave, so… Muzzafuzza: Safety first!
Ro: Yeah!

Muzzafuzza: Alright let’s do this. Ro: OK,
you ready?
Muzzafuzza: Be careful, don’t burn my fingers!

Ro: Now just work that down to the bottom.
Muzzafuzza: Work it!

Ro: Work it. Muzzafuzza: Work it, work it!
Ro: Work it, ow! Ow, that’s hot.
Ro: That’s hot… On my fingers.

Muzzafuzza: I’m trying to work it, it’s
not going very well… There we go!

Muzzafuzza: We got it good! Ro: If you only
have white chocolate, you can use
Ro: human blood to dye it this color.

Ro: Now, we’re gonna snip the tip and fill
in these little candy molds!

Muzzafuzza: Be careful! Ro: Got… Oh, oh,
oh! Quick put it in there, OK.

Muzzafuzza: Alright, alright, alright! We’re
good.

Ro: OK Now you have to squeeze it. Muzzafuzza:
Do I milk it? Like it’s a red cow?
Ro: Yeah, like an udder!

Muzzafuzza: OK, get it, go ahead! Ro: Oh it’s
really hot!

Muzzafuzza: You get 1 and then I’ll do 1.
Ro: Oh, OK!

Muzzafuzza: Is it too hot? Ro: Yeah it’s
really hot!

Muzzafuzza: Here, let me use my oven mitt.
Ro: OK, you do the oven mitt,
Muzzafuzza: Oh yeah! Ro: And then I’ll hold it. Muzzafuzza: Oh, there it is, there it is! Ro: And you… OK!

Ro: Nice! Muzzafuzza: I don’t know if there’s
gonna be enough chocolate
Muzzafuzza: for uh, a bunch of heads.

Muzzafuzza: It is not squeezing out of there
very well.

Ro: Yeah its… Muzzafuzza: There we go! Ro:
There, there there!

Muzzafuzza: We had a breakthrough! In chocolate
milking technology!

Ro: Now you put these little molds in the
freezer for about 15 minutes,
Ro: Then we’ll pop ‘em out!
Ro: Boom! Finished product!

Muzzafuzza: Now it’s time to make a Gears
of War Cog.

Ro: We have just rolled out the red fondant
and now we are going to cut out

Ro: this little cog, that we traced earlier,
into the fondant.
Ro: Cogs are done, high five… Ow!

Ro: we just used this little lid, and we pushed
it down in the middle to make
Ro: that circle.

Ro: For the next cupcakes, we’re gonna be
making some crosshairs!

Ro: Muzza’s gonna do it. We’re gonna make
4 of ‘em.

Muzzafuzza: Alright, so press, press this
circle down? Ro: Yeah just go….

Muzzafuzza: Alright. Ro: And then kinda jiggle
it.
Muzzafuzza: We’re good. Ro: Boom!
Ro: you can use this thing to do little touchups.

Ro: And then to make these little crosshairs,
we just rolled the gray fondant,

Ro: like really, really, really small, and
then we made little X’s.

Ro: Now, we’re gonna make last but not least,
the little chainsaw machine guns

Ro: from the game! Muzzafuzza: They’re actually
called lancers.
Ro: Lancer… Lancer guns from the game!

Ro: So we rolled out gray fondant, and…
Oh! Here he is.

Ro: I printed off him this is gonna take awhile
to cut out of the fondant, so just

Ro: take your time, go slow, and they’ll
look great!

Ro: Now we’re gonna use these 2 colors,
blue and dark gray to make the little
Ro: accent pieces on top of our guns.

Ro: Okie dokie! They’re all done now! Check
these little guys out.
Muzzafuzza: You are an artist! A cupcake artist!

Ro: Of sugar! Artist of sugar and crafts.
Muzzafuzza: And what is it? Fondant?
Ro: You are an artist of first person sh, Muzzafuzza:It's all Fondant.  Ro: sh, shooters!
Muzzafuzza: First person sugar! Ro: Sugars!

Ro: Now we’ve got all of our fancy decorations
done for our Gears of War 3 cupcakes,
Ro: Now we’re gonna put it all together!

Both: Fa-da! Ro: Gears of War cupcakes, what?
Those are amazing! Muzzafuzza: Oooooh!

Ro: Thank you special guest Muzzafuzza for
coming! I had so much fun!

Ro: If you have any other ideas for any Nerdy
Nummies, please let me know, leave

Ro: me a comment and I will do my best to
make it happen!
Ro: OK thanks, bye-bye!
